id: New York Times: China, Russia listening to Trump's cell phone calls
paragraph: By Eli Watkins and Molly Shiels, CNNUpdated 8:05 AM ET, Thu October 25, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump continues to make calls via cell phone despite intelligence that China and Russia listen in, The New York Times reported Wednesday.
